title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Skills: Foundations of Machine Learning-Based Colorectal Cancer Diagnosis Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Key variables (anemia, bleeding, changes in bowel habits, etc.) in a colorectal cancer diagnostic prediction model can be identified and explained.
A binary classification model can be constructed by applying the Stochastic Gradient Boosting (SGB) algorithm.
Model performance metrics (sensitivity, specificity) can be analyzed, interpreted, and improvement directions proposed.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
